title: Confining hollow ZnSe/NiSe microspheres in freestanding carbon nanofibers for flexible potassium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00086B, Paper
Bo Yan, Hao Sun, Xueping Liu, Xinyuan Fu, Changqing Xu, Tiantian Zhang, Huachao Tao, Lulu Zhang, Xifei Li, Xuelin Yang, Renheng Wang
Flexible ZnSe/NiSe@NC anodes exhibit a remarkable Coulombic efficiency, rate capability, and cycling stability. Leveraging their sophisticated composition and structure, high-capacity and long-life foldable potassium-ion batteries can be achieved.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
